quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.
Life is an operation which is done in a forward direction. One lives toward the future, because to live consists inexorably in doing, in each individual life making itself.
People change and things go wrong but just remember life goes on.
All the art of living lies in a fine mingling of letting go and holding on.
Life goes on is a redundancy. Life is defined by its going on.

Sometimes, you regret letting certain people into your life. The harm has already been done. All you can do is learn a lesson from it and move on. Life is to short to spend it on regrets. life goes on.
To be judged for your imperfections is to be judged for being human, mistakes are made, life goes on, don't let other people change who you are.

Even though we have been hurt, we must find a way to get through it, life goes on whether we want it to or not. The world keeps turning no matter how bad we feel. This is why we have to learn how to bounce back and keep moving forward.

We have this unspoken connection. We see each other, lock eyes, smile that one certain smile that means nothing to anyone else, but the world to us, and keep going on. life goes on, but our love remains.
I am strengthened by my weaknesses. I am brave because of my fears. I am greater because of my mistakes. Life goes on, forget the past.
When the pretty birds have flown, And you feel hurt and alone, Be strong and carry on, And remember that life goes on.
One thing always sure. Life go on with you or without you, no matter how much you seen.
In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
Life goes on pretty much the same way. I've been working on a couple of films on the side. You may see some more. You may even see another television show.
if something does go wrong, here is my advice. Keep calm and Carry on.
Life gets more interesting as it goes on. It becomes fuller because there is perspective there.
Remember, whether you choose to move on or stay stuck in the past, life goes on!
Life is more than just chess. Though king dies, life goes on.
Change has to come for life to struggle forward.

You either get bitter or you get better. It's that simple. You either take what has been dealt to you and allow it to make you a better person, or you allow it to tear you down. The choice does not belong to fate, It belongs to you.
You are responsible for your life. You can't keep blaming somebody else for your dysfunction. Life is really about moving on.
Sometimes our light goes out, but is blown again into instant flame by an encounter with another human being.
So long as this struggle known as life goes on, there will always be the music to fit the mood and make it better.
It's never nice to lose someone close to you; unfortunately, life goes on, and we have to make peace with it and move on.

When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
If you carry joy in your heart, you can heal any moment.
Every new beginning comes from some other beginning's end.
The great courageous act that we must all do, is to have the courage to step out of our history and past so that we can live our dreams.
Grief is in two parts. The first is loss. The second is the remaking of life.
